The tweet by Chidi Odinkalu: a lawyer and former chairman of Nigeria's National Human Rights Commission, expressing that the election in Edo State is not what it seems.
The inclusion of a two: minute video clip in the tweet, titled "War in Edo State," featuring firearms and images of Adams Oshiomole and an unidentified man.
The discovery that the video clip is not: misleadingly shared to create the impression of widespread violence ahead of the elections.
The use of the InVID WeVerify tool to ru: leading to the finding of a longer version of the footage published on YouTube in 2019, which mentioned the arrest of individuals from Edo suspected of plotting to disrupt elections in Akwa Ibom.
